main event: A Marine observed a sudden and rapid earth action, vibration, and sound that caused alarm. An object was observed hovering and rapidly rising by the witness and others.
interesting points: The object was approximately 30 feet in diameter and oval in shape.
The object hovered at an altitude of about 1,000 feet and emitted a bright, glowing light.
The object remained in the area for several minutes before rapidly accelerating and departing the scene.
The witness was a civilian resident of Annapolis, Maryland, who was determined to be a reliable and credible observer.
Further investigation was recommended by the authorities.
sighted object: A large, oval-shaped object with a bright, glowing light
witnesses: A Marine and other civilian residents
